name: Micro Coder
desc: If you would use a Cyberse monster(s) you control as Link Material for the Link Summon of a "Code Talker" monster, you can use this card in your hand as Link Material. If this card is sent from the hand or field to the GY as Link Material for the Link Summon of a "Code Talker" monster: You can add 1 "Cynet" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, or, if this card was used as material from the field, you can add 1 Level 4 Cyberse monster, instead. You can only use each effect of "Micro Coder" once per turn.
